definitions: in a way that gives protection from danger or risk

examples.text: there is a memento she keeps safely stored away
the tender plants are safely tucked up for the winter
she wants to invest safely but strategically

shortDefinitions: in way that gives protection from danger or risk

definitions: in a way that is not likely to cause or lead to harm or injury

examples.text: all of us have a responsibility to drive safely
a time when children could play safely on the streets

shortDefinitions: in way that is not likely to cause or lead to harm or injury

definitions: with confidence through being based on good reasons or evidence

examples.text: we can safely say that things are improving
you can safely assume I'm not going to resign
you can safely ignore that advice

shortDefinitions: with confidence based on good reasons or evidence

examples.text: all crews have returned safely from their missions
we are relieved to have arrived safely
